item.description: Resources to learn more about strings, encoding, Unicode… Mastering Ruby - Strings and Encodings - Book by Aaron Lasseigne Guide to string encoding in Ruby - Article by Aaron Patterson Pragmatic Unicode, or How do I stop the pain - Talk by Ned Batchelder at PyCon 2012 (from 2010, still great!) The Absolute Minimum Every Software Developer Absolutely, Positively Must Know About Unicode and Character Sets (No Excuses!) - Article by Joel Spolsky (from 2003, still great!

item.title: about
item.description: üë©üèª‚Äçüíª🐰🕳️ I’m a software engineer who loves writing code, investigating tricky bugs down rabbit holes and helping others above all things. I value curiosity and humility very highly. 📚🧮 I have a background in theoretical computer science and I wanted to study pure mathematics. I’ll do it someday. 💬🗺️ I’m a polyglot at heart, trying to be a polyglot on the outside. I like learning programming languages, even in absurd ways, and human languages as well.
